messages.message:
hello, a prospect, Kering, mentioned that it would be super helpfull to have an “Field Import” button in Build, where they can upload for example a .json file with all fields they have automatically created. Then the import will create blank fields with only the Field names from the import file.

They are asking, because they have a Use Case with around 1000 fields. So they dont want to manually create each field.<

cc: @Sanch

So this was basically our team's <#C07JG9EBTBP|> project AutoBuild (plus we also automated the process of creating that JSON file and pre-populating it with prompts based on a doc sample and a requirements doc), just we didn't have time to implement the aspect of ingesting a .json file into the Build project's database.
https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1QL4UD-17FeWEWTIq7KFEmA41NbXfEWPXcKiBqwUeZdg/edit?usp=sharing

I have it in my backlog to further scope out the requirements and implementation for allowing a Build project to be populated based on a given .json file.  From there, I'd turn to a PM to see if they would support implementing that feature into the platform.  But it sounds like this potential deal could drive a bit more urgency on implementing this feature.

v. cool nathaniel! FYI Tthis deal is set to close this quarter, and the use case they're working on is in the current pipeline of use cases to go into production soon after to help with prioritisation.
